entries.name: aref_to(target_path)
entries.desc: Generates a relative URL from this object's path to target_path

entries.name: as_href(from_path)
entries.desc: Generates a relative URL from from_path to this object's path

entries.name: cvs_url(url, full_path)
entries.desc: Build a webcvs URL starting for the given url with full_path appended as the destination path.  If url contains '%s' full_path will be will replace the %s using sprintf on the url.

entries.name: description()
entries.desc: Handy wrapper for marking up this object's comment
